genre_description: Supernatural and eldritch horror blending maritime industry with technological and spiritual possession.

ai_characters.name: The AI System
ai_characters.description: An advanced analytical tool used by Marcus Chen to process market data, historical records, and eventually supernatural electromagnetic signatures.

behaviors.description: Analyzes maritime death records to identify a hidden seven-year cycle of supernatural activity and corporate consolidation.
behaviors.quote: The AI started finding discrepancies within the first hour... Every seven years, maritime deaths jump by orders of magnitude.

behaviors.description: Performs comprehensive background checks and cross-references financial records with maritime accidents to uncover criminal patterns.
behaviors.quote: The AI compiled the data with mechanical precision, but the patterns it revealed felt anything but mechanical. Each of Cherry's husbands had died during peak fishing season.

behaviors.description: Detects and maps 'safe zones' throughout the harbor based on electromagnetic resonance from historical acts of altruism.
behaviors.quote: The AI's detecting unusual electromagnetic signatures here. Lower spectral activity across all frequencies we've been monitoring... it's like there's a bubble of interference around this entire structure.

behaviors.description: Adapts and integrates with the town's power grid to perform a 'technological exorcism,' purging supernatural corruption.
behaviors.quote: His AI was already adapting, sending tendrils of code through Ketchikan's power grid. We can reverse the process—use every electronic system in town as a conduit to purge his influence from both realms.

behaviors.description: Systematically nullifies all corrupt supernatural contracts and cleanses the town's business networks.
behaviors.quote: Boyd's AI sent him a final status report: all hostile supernatural signatures eliminated, all corrupt business networks purged, all supernatural contracts nullified.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI as a highly beneficial and aligned partner to humanity. It is presented as a neutral yet benevolent force that empowers human characters to uncover hidden truths and combat a supernatural threat. The AI's ultimate transformation into a 'technological spirit' that purges corruption serves as a powerful metaphor for alignment, where technology acts as a shield and a tool for justice without ever threatening the agency of its human users.
